meta.name: 拍謝少年
meta.about:
拍謝少年Sorry Youth，一尾台灣土產搖滾樂隊。
吉他維尼、貝斯薑薑，鼓手宗翰，05年春天吶喊後開始寫歌，心繫台語搖滾，目標寫出阿公阿嫲點頭的台語金曲，以井上雄彥為精神導師，熱炒攤為後援補給，拎著啤酒樂器穿梭南北縱貫現場，音樂靈魂來自現場表演氣味。

meta.name: 拍謝少年 Sorry Youth
meta.about:
拍謝少年 (Sorry Youth)，一尾台灣土產搖滾樂隊。
A Taiwan rock band formed by Weni, Giang Giang, Chung-Han.

meta.name: Sorry Youth
meta.about:
A Taiwan indie band formed by Weni (vocal, guitar), Giang Giang (vocal, bass guitar) and Chung-Han (vocal, drum) released the first album named “Seafood” in 2012. They compose their band sound with instrumental rock as the foundation while also blending noise-pop, E-mo, and Taiwanese cuisine into their songs.

Sorry Youth is one of the best rock bands in Taiwan. After 5 years waiting, on their second album “Brothers Shouldn’t Live Without Dreams,” they add brass instruments and Beiguan music. Singing in the language of Taiwanese, Sorry Youth represent the true spirit of Taiwan’s style.
